tool_description: A toolkit for maps: Map tiles, address search (geocoding), routing, static maps & elevation
name: MapToolkit
title: MapToolkit

api_list.name: Routing Enhancement
api_list.description: Create a routing along a specific cycleway

api_list.name: Route Enhancement
api_list.description: Enhance your GPX-file with elevation, surface and mapmatching

api_list.name: Global Terrain Raster

optional_parameters.name: ratio
optional_parameters.description: Set to `2` for retina tiles.

api_list.name: Global Terrain Winter
api_list.description: Global Terrain Tiles with winter colors.

optional_parameters.name: ratio
optional_parameters.description: Set to `2` for retina tiles.

api_list.name: Reverse

optional_parameters.name: polygon
optional_parameters.description: Language for the given instructions. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Default value is `de`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language for the given instructions. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Default value is `de`.

api_list.name: Staticmaps

optional_parameters.name: bounds
optional_parameters.description: Will be used instead of `center` and `zoom` if defined. Format is `{north},{east},{south},{west}`.

optional_parameters.name: geojson
optional_parameters.description:
Value: 
`{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`
Attributes:
`geometry` is a GeoJSON string of type `LineString` or `MultiLineString`
`color` in hex color format `{AABBGGRR}`
`width` sets the lines thickness

Repeated `geojson` parameters supported.

optional_parameters.name: maptype
optional_parameters.description: Defines the maps appearence.

optional_parameters.name: path
optional_parameters.description:
Value: 
`{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`
Attributes:
`points` are the paths coordinates `{lat},{lng}[|{lat}:{lng} ...]`
`color` in hex color format `{AABBGGRR}`
`width` sets the lines thickness

Repeated `path` parameters supported.

optional_parameters.name: delta_zoom
optional_parameters.description: Defines how many zoom levels will get added/removed if it the `zoom` was calculated automatically.

optional_parameters.name: kml
optional_parameters.description:
Value: 
`{kml}?{attribute}={value}[&{attribute}={value} ...]`
Attributes:
`color` in hex color format `{AABBGGRR}`
`width` sets the lines thickness

Repeated `kml` parameters supported.

optional_parameters.name: marker
optional_parameters.description:
Value: 
`{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`
Attributes:
`center` is the markers location
`icon` can be any public URL of a PNG or JPEG
`shadow` can be set to `false` to change the markers anchor from center to bottom

Repeated `marker` parameters supported.

optional_parameters.name: factor
optional_parameters.description: Defines the images scaling factor.

api_list.name: Elevation

optional_parameters.name: simplify
optional_parameters.description: Simplifies the points before searching for elevation.

api_list.name: Routing

required_parameters.name: points
required_parameters.description:
Value: `{lat},{lng}[|{lat},{lng} ...]`
Define multiple routing waypoints, consisting of latitude and longitude. At least 2 points are needed.

optional_parameters.name: finish_instruction
optional_parameters.description: Adds a finish instruction at the end of the route.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language for the given instructions. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Default value is `en`.

optional_parameters.name: voice_instructions
optional_parameters.description: Enables voice instructions for text to speech engines.

optional_parameters.name: filename
optional_parameters.description: Only available if the set `format` is `gpx` or `kml`.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Default format is `json`.

optional_parameters.name: weighting
optional_parameters.description: Only available if the set `routeType` is `bike`. Default value is `networks`.

api_list.name: Search

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language for the given instructions. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Default value is `de`.

optional_parameters.name: viewbox
optional_parameters.description: Defines a preferred area to search in. Format is `{minLng},{minLat},{maxLng},{maxLat}`.

optional_parameters.name: polygon
optional_parameters.description: Defines whether available polygons are added to the response data or not. Default value is `0`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of returned results. Default value is `10`.

optional_parameters.name: countrycodes
optional_parameters.description: Limits result to one or multiple countries. Passing multiple countries, they need to be separated by a comma `,`. Must be a valid  ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

api_list.name: Contours Vector Tiles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maptoolkit.p.rapidapi.com/tiles/1/1/1/contours.pbf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maptoolkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://maptoolkit.p.rapidapi.com/tiles/{z}/{x}/{y}/contours.pbf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maptoolkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
